objects.text:
• Durable Faux Leather
• Spacious Design
• Stylish Gold Hardware
• Perfect Medium Size

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner showcases a high-end tote bag with a luxurious and minimalist layout divided into a four-quadrant grid, each filled with a subtle beige or tan tone. The banner features a centered product image ("product_image") of the tote bag, set against a warm-toned background, adding sophistication and focus to the design. The top-left section presents the bold brand name ("heading") and model name ("subheading") in contrasting dark brown, followed by a subtler product type label ("product_type"). Below that, a gold-tone tagline ("tagline") emphasizes luxury. Key features are listed in a compact bullet format ("description") on the bottom-left. The price ("price") appears prominently, followed by a rounded rectangular call-to-action button with white text ("cta") on a coffee-colored background shape ("cta_background").

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige (#F5F0E8)
- Pale Rose (#E8D6C9)
- Muted Cocoa (#D7C0B1)
- Warm Taupe (#C8B6A8)
- Sandy Gold (#D4AF37)
- Chestnut Brown (#6D4C3D)
- Light Gold (#C09B7B)
- Rich Mocha (#4A342A)
- Crisp White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated leather handbag in a warm, muted camel brown shade. This primary color (#A67456) forms the base palette, exuding elegance and versatility. Accents in a polished metallic gold (#D4AF37) are used for hardware, brand lettering, and the hanging charms, adding a touch of luxury and contrast without overpowering the base color. The texture of the leather subtly blends and softens the tones, while the smooth reflection on the gold highlights creates visual focus. For an advertisement banner, complementary tones like cream (#F5F5DC), soft beige (#DCCAB4), and deep mocha (#4E342E) will enhance the chic appeal.
